wikipedia_page.main:
Hugh Meikle (25 December 1940 – 19 February 2016) was a Welsh curler and curling coach.He started curling in Toronto, Ontario in late 1960s.
He was a founder of Welsh Curling Association in 1974.

response: *Hugh Meikle (1940–2016), Welsh curler and coach
